home.testimonials.title: Client testimonials
home.testimonials.subtitle: They chose SWBS for their digital presence.
home.testimonials.1.text: “SWBS completely modernised our image and website. We now receive more quote requests than before.”
home.testimonials.2.text: “Thanks to the online shop implemented by SWBS, we sell our products 24/7.”
home.testimonials.3.text: “The chat and client area help us better follow up projects with our clients.”
